name: Hot Air
description:
It's the most wonderful time of the year!

Survive your awkward Christmas family dinner by avoiding all those awkward and divisive conversation topics. Float through 4 stages, or play the Endless mode, collecting convenient excuses to avoid further conversation with your relatives. Don't hit too many of those hot topics, otherwise you'll get them ranting and raving, and ruin Christmas for everyone. You still love them, you just wish you were somewhere else.

Hot Air was a game created for Awful Holiday Jam 2018, "Festive Spirits."

Credits

Alligator - art, programming
HardClumping - audio
sponge - programming

Technology Used

SDL - little bit of everything
Wren - embedded scripting language
rlgl - OpenGL wrapper
PhysicsFS - virtual filesystem
dear imgui - debugging tools
SoLoud - audio engine
JFXR - bleeps and bloops

Engine and game source code are available at GitHub.
